name: Dry Season
rule: Nectar/Heal events are disabled this season.

name: Reflective Fog
rule: 20% of local multipliers invert (×0.5 instead of ×2) on trigger.

name: Overheat
rule: Explosions add +2 extra Entropy but add +0.2 ChainLen instantly.

name: Sparse Soil
rule: Empty tiles reduce adjacent L by −0.2 (min 1.0).

name: Storm Pulse
rule: At start of Bloom, strike 3 random plants: reset stacks but grant +2 power.
notes: High variance; pairs with Echo Fern.

name: Silent Bloom
rule: No sound/FX feedback but +10% score this season.

name: Mirror Grid
rule: Mirrored positions trigger after their counterparts (free +1 ChainLen per pair).

name: Brittle Vines
rule: Creepvine/Sporeling have 25% chance to wither on trigger (count as death).
